mapper.select: select ROUND(avg(dust_density),2) as dust_density,ROUND(avg(temperature),2) as temperature,ROUND(avg(humidity),2) as humidity,ROUND(avg(wind_speed),2) as wind_speed,date_format(monitor_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') as monitor_datetime from environment_info where monitor_local = #{local} group by date_format(monitor_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H')
